2024 Annual Meeting

Last updated on August 13, 2024

We are excited to announce the 2024 Annual OHBM Australia Meeting, in collaboration with the Maths in the Brain Workshop. The event will take place in person at the Kenneth Myer Building, Ian Potter Auditorium, located at 30 Royal Parade, Parkville VIC 3052, on November 7th and 8th.

Our goal is to unite the community of researchers who apply computational, mathematical, and imaging methods in neuroscience.

Abstract Submission

Abstract submission is now open. The submission deadline is September 13th, 5 PM AEDT. Accepted abstracts will be featured in the poster session, and the ECR Committee will select some for ECR talks.

  Submit an abstract

Registration

Please register for this event from here.

Stay tuned to this webpage for updates on registration details and speaker announcements, which will be added in the coming weeks.

We look forward to your participation and contributions. For any questions or additional information, please feel free to contact us.
